patterns: What are the major projects of OPEN community?
responses: OPEN is an initiative started with the aim of contributing to the Open Source community. Some of our major projects are: Auto-Infirmary, Docker- guide and many more.
Some of our major projects are: Auto-Infirmary, Docker-guide and many more. Read more about them here: https://upes-open.org/projects
